description: Introduction January has always been a crazy month for me. I met with and/or saw presentations from over 29 companies at CES and 59 companies at AR/VR/MR and took about 2,000 between the two conferences. As discussed in SPIE AR/VR/MR 2025 Next Week (with comments on CES, Display Week, & AWE), CES is a logistics […]
title: AR/VR/MR 2025 AI Glasses Panel (Also Apple AR Glasses Cancelled? & DeepSeek)
